name: Save Steve [BETA 0.1.0]
description:
You play as a robot named "James" who was created by a flying robot named "Jim" to save his friend "Steve."

Will you be able to take it to First Place Studios and BEAT THE CEO, are you going to TAKE STEVE BACK?

Report Bugs In Comments and @THIRDPARTYSTUDIOS via INSTAGRAM

Version: BETA 0.1.0
